meanings.sent1: She is so undependable that I never know if she will show up on time.
meanings.sent2: The undependable weather forecast made it difficult to plan our outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: His undependable excuses for being late always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The undependable internet connection was like a fickle friend, coming and going as it pleased.
meanings.sent5: The undependable car broke down in the middle of the highway, causing a huge traffic jam.

meanings.definition: Not able to be depended on.
meanings.sent1: The old bridge was undependable and unsafe to cross.
meanings.sent2: An undependable source of information can lead to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The undependable clock in the office always shows the wrong time.
meanings.sent4: Her undependable memory was like a leaky bucket, unable to hold onto important details.
meanings.sent5: The undependable elevator kept getting stuck between floors, causing frustration among the tenants.
